Transcription for 996931

Sing me that, O I am all-sager, Where I can never leave.
From a bold hand, straightly giller, Shall control me, or from me.
I can never, I can never, I can never, Where there is a truth to tell.
But with faith I will be saved.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
But with faith I will be saved.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
Where there is a truth to tell.
But with faith I will be saved.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
I'm a man, he'll be a trouble, When we are troubled and rare.
Hallelujah, my God!
